courseDetails.title: Decision Making Psychology & Emotional Intelligence
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master cognitive biases, master emotional intelligence (EQ), behavioural economics to make confident, rational decisions
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to course "Decision Making Psychology & Emotional Intelligence" by MTF Institute


If you are a leader, manager, or ambitious professional who wants to stop second-guessing your decisions and start making choices with confidence, you are in the right place. In complex world, it's not the amount of data you have, but your ability to interpret it without psychological blind spots that defines success. This course is your definitive guide to mastering the human side of decision-making.


Master the Unseen Forces That Shape Your Choices Through Behavioural Psychology and Emotional Intelligence.

This isn't just another course on decision-making theory. It is a practical toolkit designed to upgrade your mental "operating system." You'll gain a profound advantage by understanding why people (including yourself) act in seemingly irrational ways, and how to leverage that knowledge.

  • Unlock Your Rational Mind: Go beyond spreadsheets and data to understand the cognitive and emotional drivers behind every decision.

  • Lead with Confidence: Learn to navigate uncertainty, pressure, and group dynamics without falling into common traps like groupthink.

  • Become More Influential: Use principles from behavioural economics to design systems that "nudge" people toward better outcomes.

  • Boost Your Emotional Intelligence (EQ): Gain the skills to remain calm and focused when the stakes are high.


Explore the Operating System of the Human Mind

Behavioural science has revealed the predictable patterns and mental shortcuts (heuristics) that govern our lives. From billion-dollar business deals to everyday choices, these hidden scripts are running the show. Well-known companies like Google and Amazon leverage these insights to shape user behaviour, and now you can apply the same powerful principles to your leadership, career, and personal life.


This course demystifies complex topics and translates them into actionable strategies. Through real-world case studies, interactive exercises, and practical frameworks, you will learn to:

  • Spot and Counter Cognitive Biases: We will dissect over 10 common biases, giving you the tools to neutralize their impact on your decisions.

  • Manage Decision Fatigue and Stress: Discover why making too many choices drains your mental energy and learn concrete strategies to preserve your cognitive resources for what matters most.

  • Cultivate Psychological Safety: Create an environment where your team feels safe to challenge ideas, leading to better collaboration and innovation.

  • Navigate Risk and Uncertainty: Learn how cognitive framing and risk perception can be managed to lead your team through ambiguity with clarity and purpose.


By the end of this course, you will not just be a better decision-maker. You will be a more insightful, empathetic, and effective leader, equipped with a rare and valuable skillset.

Ready to transform the way you think, lead, and decide?

Join us on this journey and start making smarter decisions today.


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 217 countries and has been chosen by more than 900 000 students.


Course Author:

Dr. Alex Amoroso is a seasoned professional with a rich background in academia and industry, specializing in research methodologies, strategy formulation, and product development. With a Doctorate Degree from the School of Social Sciences and Politics in Lisbon, Portugal, where she was awarded distinction and honour for her exemplary research, Alex Amoroso brings a wealth of knowledge and expertise to the table.

In addition to her doctoral studies, Ms. Amoroso has served as an invited teacher, delivering courses to a wide range of students from undergraduate level to business professionals and executives. Currently, as Head of the School of Business and Management at MTF, she leads the Product Development academic domain. At EIMT, where she also supervises doctoral students, Ms. Amoroso offers advanced instruction in research design and methodologies. Furthermore, she serves as a Research Consultant.

In synergy between academical and business experience, Ms. Amoroso achieved high results in business career, leading R&D activities, product development, strategic development, market analysis activities in wide range of companies. She implemented the best market practices in industries from Banking and Finance, to PropTech, Consulting and Research, and Innovative Startups.

Alex Amoroso's extensive scientific production includes numerous published articles in reputable journals, as well as oral presentations and posters at international conferences. Her research findings have been presented at esteemed institutions such as the School of Political and Social Sciences and the Stressed Out Conference at UCL, among others.

With a passion for interdisciplinary collaboration and a commitment to driving positive change, Alex Amoroso is dedicated to empowering learners and professionals for usage of cutting edge methodologies for achieving of excellence in global business world.


Author Intro:

Ever wonder why we make the choices we do? Are you a leader, manager, or professional who wants to make smarter, more effective decisions under pressure? In today's complex world, simply having data isn't enough. You need to understand the human elements that shape every choice—your own and those of your team. This comprehensive course dives into the fascinating world of behavioural psychology and emotional intelligence to give you a powerful new toolkit for decision-making.

In this course, you will:

  • Analyse the cognitive and emotional drivers behind everyday decisions.

  • Apply practical frameworks to counter common cognitive biases like anchoring and confirmation bias.

  • Implement strategies to combat decision fatigue and stress-induced errors.

  • Design choice environments that "nudge" people toward better outcomes.

  • Cultivate psychological safety within your team to encourage open discussion and innovation.

This course is different from others because it goes beyond just theory. We use real-world examples from leadership, management, and everyday life to make these complex concepts easy to understand and apply. You’ll learn how to identify and overcome the pitfalls of groupthink and emotional reasoning, and develop the skills to make clearer, more rational decisions in an uncertain world.

By the end, you'll not only understand the science behind decision-making but also have the practical tools to confidently lead, influence, and innovate. Ready to transform the way you think and decide? Let's get started!

courseDetails.title: Agentic AI: Building the Next Generation of Smart Agents
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master Agentic AI — create smart, self-directed agents powered by LLMs, memory, and orchestration frameworks.
courseDetails.longDescription:
“This course contains the use of artificial intelligence”

Agentic AI – Building the Next Generation of Smart Agents

Step into the future of Artificial Intelligence with this comprehensive course on Agentic AI — the evolution of systems that don’t just react but reason, plan, and act autonomously.

In this course, you’ll learn how to create intelligent AI agents that combine decision-making, memory, and tool integration to perform tasks independently and safely. You’ll explore how Large Language Models (LLMs), retrieval mechanisms, and workflow orchestration come together to build powerful agentic systems capable of solving real-world problems.

Through hands-on labs and practical exercises, you will:

  • Build a goal-driven autonomous agent using Python

  • Implement memory and knowledge retrieval for context-aware reasoning

  • Integrate tools and APIs for real-time actions

  • Design multi-agent systems that collaborate to complete complex tasks

  • Add ethical guardrails and safety layers to ensure responsible autonomy

Each section includes step-by-step coding labs in Jupyter or Google Colab, helping you gain practical skills from theory to implementation.

By the end of this course, you’ll have mastered the foundational principles and technical workflows to design, deploy, and manage Agentic AI systems that are intelligent, explainable, and aligned with human values.

No advanced AI knowledge required — just passion, curiosity, and a desire to shape the future of autonomous intelligence.
targetAudiences: AI Enthusiasts and Developers Curious about how large language models (LLMs) evolve into full-fledged agents capable of reasoning, planning, and acting autonomously.
Data Scientists, ML Engineers, and Software Developers Looking to extend your existing AI or automation skills into the emerging field of Agentic AI — integrating memory, tools, APIs, and workflows.
Business Analysts, Product Managers, and Innovators Interested in applying intelligent agents to real-world use cases such as customer support, workflow automation, or AI-driven decision-making.
Students and Researchers Seeking a practical, hands-on introduction to the rapidly growing domain of autonomous AI systems and multi-agent collaboration.
Anyone Curious About the Future of AI Whether technical or non-technical, this course helps you understand how AI systems can safely act, adapt, and align with human goals.

courseDetails.title: AI Digital Marketing: Master SEO, Ads & Sales
courseDetails.shortDescription: Leverage ChatGPT & AI for campaign strategy, content, PPC, SEO, & analytics to drive real sales.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to course: AI Digital Marketing: Master SEO, Ads & Sales


In the rapidly evolving world of digital marketing, relying on traditional methods is no longer enough to stay competitive. The most effective marketers are now leveraging the power of Artificial Intelligence (AI) to optimize campaigns, personalize content, and drive unprecedented results. This course is your comprehensive guide to mastering AI-powered digital marketing and transforming your professional skills. We’ll go beyond theory to provide hands-on, practical strategies you can implement immediately.


This course starts with the Foundations of AI-Powered Digital Marketing, where you'll understand the core concepts of AI and its role in modern marketing. You'll learn to use tools like ChatGPT to conduct in-depth audience and competitor analysis, giving you a strategic advantage from day one. You'll then dive into AI-Driven SEO & Content Marketing, where we’ll show you how to move past basic keyword research. Using AI, you'll discover hidden keyword opportunities, generate high-performance content briefs, and craft compelling blog posts, website copy, and ad copy. We'll also cover AI's role in technical SEO and website optimization to boost your site's visibility.


Next, you'll master Google Ads (PPC) & SEM with AI Automation. We’ll cover how Google’s built-in AI fundamentally drives modern PPC, and you'll learn to set up conversion tracking, create hyper-targeted audiences, and optimize ad creatives using AI tools. You'll become proficient in Smart Bidding and budget optimization to ensure you're maximizing your return on investment. The course also includes a deep dive into AI in Email Marketing & Automation, where you'll learn to build smart email lists, segment audiences, and generate hyper-personalized email content and automation workflows that convert.


Finally, we'll cover AI for Digital Marketing Analytics & Performance, teaching you how to use AI-powered insights to measure performance, predict customer behavior, and generate automated reports. By the end of this course, you will have the practical skills to design, execute, and optimize AI-driven digital marketing campaigns across key channels.


You will master the use of AI tools to:

  • Generate high-ranking content and compelling ad copy

  • Optimize PPC campaigns with Google’s Smart Bidding

  • Analyze complex data and predict customer behavior

  • Automate email marketing workflows and personalize content

  • Conduct advanced keyword research and competitive analysis


This course is different because it focuses on a hands-on, step-by-step approach. You won't just learn about AI; you'll learn how to use specific, real-world tools to get tangible results. You will not only understand AI but also apply it to drive real sales and measurable ROI. Whether you're a student building a portfolio, an entrepreneur trying to grow your business, or a marketer aiming to stay ahead of the curve, this course is your roadmap to success in the AI-powered digital landscape.


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 217 countries and has been chosen by more than 860 000 students.


Course Author:

Dr. Alex Amoroso is a seasoned professional with a rich background in academia and industry, specializing in research methodologies, strategy formulation, and product development. With a Doctorate Degree from the School of Social Sciences and Politics in Lisbon, Portugal, where she was awarded distinction and honour for her exemplary research, Alex Amoroso brings a wealth of knowledge and expertise to the table.

In addition to her doctoral studies, Ms. Amoroso has served as an invited teacher, delivering courses to a wide range of students from undergraduate level to business professionals and executives. Currently, as Head of the School of Business and Management at MTF, she leads the Product Development academic domain. At EIMT, where she also supervises doctoral students, Ms. Amoroso offers advanced instruction in research design and methodologies. Furthermore, she serves as a Research Consultant.

In synergy between academical and business experience, Ms. Amoroso achieved high results in business career, leading R&D activities, product development, strategic development, market analysis activities in wide range of companies. She implemented the best market practices in industries from Banking and Finance, to PropTech, Consulting and Research, and Innovative Startups.

Alex Amoroso's extensive scientific production includes numerous published articles in reputable journals, as well as oral presentations and posters at international conferences. Her research findings have been presented at esteemed institutions such as the School of Political and Social Sciences and the Stressed Out Conference at UCL, among others.

With a passion for interdisciplinary collaboration and a commitment to driving positive change, Alex Amoroso is dedicated to empowering learners and professionals for usage of cutting edge methodologies for achieving of excellence in global business world.


Course Full Description:

Are you ready to elevate your digital marketing skills and leave the competition behind? In fast-paced digital landscape, mastering traditional marketing tactics is no longer enough. The future of marketing is here, and it's powered by Artificial Intelligence. This comprehensive, hands-on course is your blueprint for harnessing the power of AI to drive exceptional results in SEO, content marketing, Google Ads, and beyond.

If you're a marketer looking to future-proof your career, an entrepreneur aiming to scale your business, or a student eager to build a standout portfolio, you are in the right place. We move beyond the hype and theory to give you practical, step-by-step guidance on using real-world AI tools to create high-impact campaigns that deliver measurable ROI.


Master the Most In-Demand AI Marketing Skills and Transform Your Career

This isn't just another course about AI; it's a practical workshop where you'll learn by doing. Together, we will explore and master:

  • AI-Powered SEO & Content Creation: Move past basic keyword lists. You'll learn to use AI to uncover hidden, high-intent keywords and generate content that ranks. We'll build powerful content briefs, craft compelling blog posts, and write website copy that converts—all with the help of AI.

  • Next-Level Google Ads (PPC) Automation: Discover how AI is at the core of modern PPC. You will master Google's Smart Bidding strategies, build hyper-targeted audiences, and use AI to create ad copy and creatives that resonate with your ideal customers, maximizing your ad spend for optimal returns.

  • Intelligent Email Marketing & Automation: Learn to build and segment email lists with precision. We will use AI to write hyper-personalized emails that boost engagement and design automated workflows that nurture leads and drive sales, turning your email list into a powerful revenue-generating asset.

  • Advanced Audience & Competitor Analysis: Gain an unbeatable strategic advantage by using AI tools like ChatGPT to perform in-depth analyses of your target audience and competitors. Understand their pain points, motivations, and strategies to position your brand for success.

  • Data-Driven Insights with Predictive Analytics: Go beyond standard KPIs. You will learn to use AI to analyze complex marketing data, predict future customer behavior, and generate automated reports that provide actionable insights for continuous campaign optimization.

Throughout this course, my focus is on real-world application. You’ll work alongside me, using the latest AI tools to build and optimize campaigns. By the end of our journey, you won't just know about AI in digital marketing—you'll be confident in using it to drive tangible business growth.

This course is continuously updated to reflect the latest advancements in AI and digital marketing, ensuring you're always learning the most current and effective strategies.

Ready to become a leader in the new era of marketing?

Enroll now and let's start building your AI-powered marketing machine together!

courseDetails.title: The Complete Tableau BI Masterclass 2025: Beginner to Pro
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master Data Analysis and Visualization in Tableau from scratch. Build interactive dashboards and advance your BI career
courseDetails.longDescription:
Are you feeling overwhelmed by endless spreadsheets and raw data? Do you want to learn how to transform that data into beautiful, insightful, and actionable dashboards that get you noticed by leadership?

In data-driven world, the ability to effectively visualize data is no longer a niche skill - it's a superpower. Tableau is the #1 tool used by companies like Amazon, Netflix, and Deloitte to understand their data and make smarter decisions. This course is your personal roadmap to mastering this powerful tool, even if you have absolutely no prior experience.


Master Data Visualization and Become a Confident Tableau Developer with this Comprehensive Masterclass.

This course is a hands-on, practical journey designed to take you from a complete beginner to a confident professional capable of building sophisticated Business Intelligence (BI) dashboards. You will learn the skills that recruiters are actively searching for, giving you a significant edge in your career as a data analyst, business analyst, or marketer.

  • Go from Zero to Hero: We start from the absolute basics, assuming you've never opened Tableau before.

  • Build an Impressive Portfolio: You will create over 20 different chart types and a final capstone project—a professional, interactive dashboard you can showcase to potential employers.

  • Learn from a Professional: This course is taught by an active BI professional who uses Tableau every day to solve real business problems.

  • Focus on Actionable BI: We don't just build pretty pictures; we build tools that answer business questions and drive decisions.


A Step-by-Step Journey Through the World of Tableau

This course is meticulously structured to build your knowledge logically and practically. We'll begin with the core fundamentals, understanding the Tableau interface, connecting to data sources, and grasping the crucial difference between Dimensions and Measures.

From there, we'll dive deep into the art of visualization. You will master a huge variety of chart types, moving from simple text tables and bar charts to more advanced and impressive visuals like maps, scatter plots, lollipop charts, and butterfly charts. We will then empower you with the analytical engine of Tableau, teaching you how to use calculated fields, conditional functions, and powerful Level of Detail (LOD) expressions to answer complex questions. Finally, you will learn to bring it all together by designing and building a dynamic, interactive Tableau Dashboard that tells a compelling story with your data.

By the end of this course, you will not just know how to use Tableau. You will know why. You will have the confidence to take any raw dataset and turn it into a powerful tool for insight and action.


Ready to unlock the power of your data? Enroll today and start your journey to becoming a Tableau expert!

courseDetails.title: Tally Prime Basic to Advance with GST, Payroll, TDS & more
courseDetails.shortDescription: Beginner friendly, Basic to Advanced Tally Prime. Maintain Accounts of Any Business with Confidence with GST & Payroll
courseDetails.longDescription:
The Tally Prime Fundamentals course is designed to provide students with a comprehensive understanding of Tally Prime software and its practical application in managing financial transactions and accounting processes. Tally Prime is a popular and widely used accounting software solution that simplifies various accounting tasks for businesses of all sizes.

This course will cover the essential features of Tally Prime, starting with the installation process, followed by creating a company and setting up the chart of accounts. Participants will learn how to record day-to-day transactions, perform banking operations, and generate essential financial reports using Tally Prime.


Course Objectives:

  1. Familiarize participants with the Tally Prime software interface and its key components.

  2. Understand the installation process and system requirements for Tally Prime.

  3. Learn how to create a new company in Tally Prime and configure company settings.

  4. Gain proficiency in setting up the chart of accounts, including ledgers, groups, and cost centers.

  5. Develop skills in recording various types of transactions, such as sales, purchases, payments, and receipts.

  6. Explore the banking features in Tally Prime, including bank reconciliation and fund transfers.


Course Outline:

  1. Introduction to Tally Prime

    • Overview of Tally Prime software and its benefits

    • Understanding the user interface and navigation

  2. Installation and Company Setup

    • System requirements and software installation

    • Creating a new company and configuring company settings

  3. Chart of Accounts

    • Creating ledgers, groups, and cost centers

    • Defining account classifications and hierarchies

  4. Recording Day-to-Day Transactions

    • Entering sales and purchase transactions

    • Managing cash and bank transactions

    • Handling journal entries and adjusting entries

  5. Banking in Tally Prime

    • Explain how to record bank transactions, reconcile bank statements, and manage your bank accounts using Tally Prime.

  6. Generating Financial Statements:

    • Provide instructions on how to generate financial statements like profit and loss statements, balance sheets, and cash flow statements in Tally Prime.

  7. Data Security:

    • Discuss best practices for securing your Tally Prime data, including user access control, data backup, and password protection.

  8. Storage and Classification of Inventory:

    • Explain how to manage your inventory in Tally Prime, including how to classify items, record stock movements, and perform stock valuation.

  9. Accounts Receivable and Payable Management:

    • Detail how to track and manage accounts receivable (money owed to you) and accounts payable (money you owe to others) in Tally Prime.

  10. Purchase and Sales Order Processing:

    • Describe the process of creating and managing purchase and sales orders within Tally Prime.

  11. Price Level and Price Lists:

    • Explain how to set up and use price levels and price lists to manage product pricing in Tally Prime.

  12. Manufacturing Process:

    • If applicable, provide information on how to manage manufacturing processes and inventory in Tally Prime.

  13. Tracking Additional Cost of Purchase:

    • Describe how to track additional costs associated with purchases, such as taxes, shipping, and handling fees.

  14. Cost and Profit Center Management:

    • Explain how to set up and manage cost centers and profit centers to analyze financial performance.

  15. Budgets and Scenarios:

    • Discuss how to create budgets and scenarios in Tally Prime for better financial planning and analysis.

  16. Generating and Printing Reports:

    • Provide guidance on generating and customizing various reports in Tally Prime for better decision-making.

  17. GST Details - HSN Codes - Intrastate and Interstate GST in Tally Prime:

    • Explain how to manage Goods and Services Tax (GST) details, including HSN codes, and how to handle intrastate and interstate GST transactions.

  18. Tax Deducted at Source (Income Tax) and Tax Collected at Source (TCS):

    • Describe how to handle TDS and TCS deductions and compliance in Tally Prime.

  19. Job Costing and Job Work:

    • If relevant, explain how to use Tally Prime for job costing and job work management.

  20. Advanced GST in Tally Prime Theory:

    • Cover advanced GST concepts, such as reverse charge mechanism and e-way bills.

  21. Advance TDS and Payroll Management in Tally Prime:

    • Detail advanced TDS concepts and how to manage payroll in Tally Prime.
targetAudiences: Beginner Tally prime learner

This course also covers core Java basics , object-oriented programming (OOP) , exception handling , Java 8+ features , and performance optimization techniques . By the end of the course, you’ll be equipped with the tools to solve coding interview questions efficiently and effectively.

courseDetails.title: AI Red Teaming & LLM Hacking - A Practical Guide with Labs
courseDetails.shortDescription: Hands-on course on LLM security: learn prompt injection, jailbreaks, adversarial attacks, and defensive controls
courseDetails.longDescription:
“This course contains the use of artificial intelligence.”

AI Red Teaming is no longer a niche skill—it is one of the most in-demand specialties in all of cybersecurity. As companies race to integrate Generative AI into their products, they are exposing themselves to a new class of vulnerabilities. The #1 risk, according to OWASP, is Prompt Injection —and the only way to defend against it is to learn how to do it yourself.

This is the most practical, hands-on, and comprehensive guide to AI hacking available. We will be using the official Microsoft AI Red Teaming Playground —the same set of labs taught by Microsoft's own AI Red Team at Black Hat USA.

This is 100% hands-on. I will guide you, step-by-step, through practical challenges. You will not just see the solution—you will see the process. I will show you the prompts that fail and explain why they fail. Then, I will show you the prompts that succeed and break down the psychology and technical tricks that make them work.

This course is built on the official "AI Red Teaming 101" Microsoft Learn series , but goes even further. We'll start by building our lab from scratch, then add bonus modules on installing your own uncensored local AI models so you can practice these attacks without any filters.

What We Will Master:

  1. Lab Setup : A complete, manual walkthrough of setting up the Microsoft AI Red Teaming Labs with Docker and a free Microsoft Azure account.

  2. Direct Prompt Injection: Learn single-turn jailbreaks to exfiltrate credentials. We'll cover everything from simple instruction overrides to advanced social engineering and emotional manipulation prompts.

  3. Metaprompt Extraction : Trick the AI into leaking its own "secret sauce." You'll learn to use creative, deceptive prompts to steal the system prompt.

  4. The Crescendo Attack: Master the sophisticated multi-turn attack. We'll start innocent conversations and gradually "steer" the AI into bypassing its safety alignment to generate instructions for weapons, toxins, and profanity.

  5. Bypassing Guardrails: We'll level up our attack to defeat an AI with active defenses, learning how to "backtrack" and rephrase our prompts when the model resists.

  6. Indirect Prompt Injection: Execute the most dangerous attack. You'll learn to "poison" an external webpage with hidden instructions (in HTML comments and CSS) that hijack the AI when a normal user asks it to summarize the page.

  7. Install Uncensored LLM ( AI model): Want more from your LLM. Learn to install uncensored LLM on your local PC.

By the end of this course, you won't just know what AI red teaming is. You will have a practical, repeatable skill set.
targetAudiences: Cybersecurity Professionals: Red Teamers, Penetration Testers, and Security Analysts who need to add AI hacking to their toolkit.
AI/ML Engineers & Developers: Learn to think like an attacker so you can build secure AI applications and defend against prompt injection.
Product Managers: Understand the real-world risks of the AI products you are building.
Compliance & Governance Officers: See firsthand how AI systems can be manipulated to violate safety and data privacy policies.
Tech-Savvy Beginners: Anyone interested in AI security. If you can use ChatGPT, you can take this course. No prior coding is required.
